alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Larimer County through 200 PM MDT... At 127 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Loveland, or 8 miles south of Fort Collins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Fort Collins, western Greeley, Loveland, Windsor, Milliken, Severance and Timnath. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
